attributes.action: Declare a national holiday for one day if England win the World Cup final.
attributes.additional_details:
Not everyone will be able to enjoy this historical moment,  we still have our emergency services that will
No doubtedly still be running, the vast majority of people did not expect us to qualify let alone make it to the semi finals, if we can succeed and make it to the final I would like to request that employers mandatorily give everyone the day off to save lateness and self certified sick days, let’s celebrate and recover as a nation.  I do believe England Day should be made official!
attributes.background: Our nation is united in one sport, football may very well be coming home,  it’s a pastime and now our time! Let’s have the chance to celebrate properly!
